Package org.jdbi.v3.guice

Class AbstractJdbiGlobalsModule

java.lang.Object
com.google.inject.AbstractModule
org.jdbi.v3.guice.AbstractJdbiGlobalsModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.inject.Module, JdbiBinderSupport
public abstract class AbstractJdbiGlobalsModule extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule implements JdbiBinderSupport
Base module for global JDBI customizations. In more complex projects with multiple JDBI definitions, there are often elements (e.g. mappers or plugins) that should be shared between all JDBI instances. Actual JDBI instances are defined in modules extending AbstractJdbiModule, which are private guice modules. To avoid having to e.g. add a plugin every time, one or more modules that extend AbstractJdbiGlobalsModule. Any mapper, plugin, codec, array type or customizer that is defined in a global module will be added to any JDBI definition.

This module does neither define a JDBI binding nor requires a data source to be bound.
